Hi LegendsLab Team,

I have a track record of building AI driven applications for over 5 years, and I believe my experience can help you reach your goals!

A few highlights of my skills:
- Proficiency in building agentic AI applications using LLMs and RAGs
- Experience with Microservices Architecture
- Extensive experience in frontend development (mainly React)
- Expertise in backend development with Python or Node.js
- Hands on experience in MLOps
- Leadership skills

Some project examples:
1. I worked as a Data Scientist at a fintech startup in Germany, where I optimized ETL pipelines and reduced cloud costs by 90%. I also developed an agentic chatbot for customer support, which cut operational costs by 70%. I collaborated with different departments and learned the priorities of each decision maker to provide custom solutions.
2. I developed a remote robot operation app together with managers and hardware engineers. I strategized and implemented a system that allows seamless machine control. I managed both frontend and backend development, enabling users to issue commands to the robot and program sequences tracked with computer vision algorithms. I also evaluated the performance of computer vision using MLOps methods to ensure high accuracy in production.

I have a proven track record of delivering results-driven AI software solutions. I also have years of mentoring experience, which helps me explain technical concepts clearly to stakeholders.

Looking forward to discuss how I can contribute to your project's success. Let's schedule a meeting soon!

Best regards,
Julien
